planet.name: Gliese 667C b
GJ 667C b
Gj 667C b
Gl 667C b
planet.description: Gliese 667 C is a member of a triple star system in the constellation Scorpius. According to a new study by Guillem Anglada-Escude and Paul Butler of the Carnegie Institute in Washington this planet is right in the middle of the habitable zone

Gliese 667 C is a member of a triple star system in the constellation Scorpius. According to a new study by Guillem Anglada-Escude and Paul Butler of the Carnegie Institute in Washington this planet is right in the middle of the habitable zone
